# Stakeholder Review Checklist

Use this checklist when updating process documentation or introducing a new role/persona to ensure alignment, communication, and accountability.

---

## Document/Change Information
- **Document(s) being updated:** _____________________
- **Change owner:** _____________________
- **Date initiated:** _____________________
- **Target completion date:** _____________________

---

## Checklist Items

### 1. Alignment with Existing Documentation
- [ ] Reviewed related process docs to ensure consistency
- [ ] Checked for conflicts or overlaps with existing roles/processes
- [ ] Updated cross-references and links in affected documents
- [ ] Ensured terminology is consistent with OctoAcme glossary (if applicable)

**Notes:**
_Document any alignment issues or decisions made here._

---

### 2. Stakeholder Review Required
- [ ] **Yes** – Stakeholder review is required
- [ ] **No** – Stakeholder review is not required

**If Yes, list stakeholders:**
- Stakeholder 1: _____________________ (Role: _______)
- Stakeholder 2: _____________________ (Role: _______)
- Stakeholder 3: _____________________ (Role: _______)

**Review status:**
- [ ] Review invitations sent (Date: ________)
- [ ] Feedback received and incorporated
- [ ] Final approval obtained

**Notes:**
_Summarize key feedback or concerns raised by stakeholders._

---

### 3. Communications Plan
- [ ] Identified audiences who need to be informed (teams, leadership, external partners)
- [ ] Drafted communication message (email, Slack announcement, etc.)
- [ ] Scheduled communication date: ___________________
- [ ] Communication sent and acknowledged

**Communication channels used:**
- [ ] Email
- [ ] Slack/Teams
- [ ] All-hands or team meeting
- [ ] Documentation site announcement
- [ ] Other: _____________________

**Notes:**
_Link to communication draft or summarize key points._

---

### 4. Training Needs
- [ ] **Training required** – Specify type and audience below
- [ ] **No training required**

**If training is required:**
- **Target audience(s):** _____________________
- **Training format:** (e.g., workshop, self-paced guide, brown bag session)
- **Training materials prepared:** [ ] Yes [ ] No
- **Training delivery date:** _____________________
- **Training completion tracked:** [ ] Yes [ ] No

**Notes:**
_Link to training materials or outline training plan._

---

### 5. Acceptance Criteria / Success Metrics
- [ ] Defined clear acceptance criteria for this change
- [ ] Identified success metrics or KPIs to measure impact
- [ ] Established review date to assess effectiveness: ___________________

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. _____________________________________________________
2. _____________________________________________________
3. _____________________________________________________

**Success Metrics:**
- Metric 1: _____________________________________________________
- Metric 2: _____________________________________________________

**Notes:**
_Describe how success will be measured and who will track it._

---

## Sign-Off
- **Change Owner:** _____________________ (Signature/Date)
- **Approver (if required):** _____________________ (Signature/Date)

---

## Additional Notes
_Use this section for any additional context, risks, or follow-up actions._
